title: TPG Capital buys controlling stake in digital services company Altimetrik
description: Altimetrik, backed by TPG Capital, expands its reach with a robust partner network including Snowflake. The company's leadership team, under CEO Raj Sundaresan, focuses on driving innovation and delivering business outcomes, solidifying its position in the digital business landscape.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
